com.prodp.apsim
Class APProcessableItem

java.lang.Object
  com.prodp.apsim.APProcessableItem
Direct Known Subclasses:
APWorld
public abstract class APProcessableItem
extends java.lang.Object

Base class for classes that read and write from a file.

Constructor Detail

APProcessableItem

public APProcessableItem()
Default constructor. Do not use.

APProcessableItem

public APProcessableItem(java.lang.String s)
Main constructor. Links to a specific path of a file, and creates the necessary input and output streams.

Parameters:
s - the path to the file
Method Detail

public final java.lang.String getPath()
Gets the path of the file.

write

public abstract void write()
                    throws java.io.IOException
Writes to the file. The process is specified elsewhere.

Throws:
java.io.IOException

read

public abstract void read()
                   throws java.io.IOException
Reads from the file. The process is specified elsewhere, and the data is not returned from the function; rather, it is put somewhere else while executing the function.

Throws:
java.io.IOException
